segments.text: How are you doing today ? How many in your book today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine , thank you . There be five of us . The rest will be along shortly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , this way , please . Something to drink first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wold you like to see menu first or wait for your friends ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wait , but please bring me some bread . Maybe I'd like to have some appetizer before they get here . Please give me the menu , and let me have a look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , sir . If you need anything else , please let me know , and I'll be happy to get it for you right away .
segments.speaker: S1
